Detailed Description

NameGroupBox is widget to edit a spirit:nameGroup element in IP-Xact.

This class provides 3 GUI items to set a name, displayName and description for an element in IP-Xact.

bool NameGroupBox::isValid (  )  const

Check if the widget is in valid mode.

This function checks that name-field is not empty and does not contain string with embedded whitespace characters.

Returns:
True if everything is ok.
